attributes.title: Language
attributes.review: Couldn’t understand the language it was written in. There’s not a lot of translating options

attributes.title: nope
attributes.review: I just don’t see the point of this app so just don’t download it. with teamwork we can get this down to 1 star. I believe in you guys.

attributes.title: No no for me 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I first opened the app and seen something so horrific and disgusting I seen a big headed small Cheeto looking thing that had a thing for children and is racist. 🥱

attributes.title: Terrible app.
attributes.review: This app has had me scarred for life. Once I got the app I had saw a small Cheeto head floating around the fortnite map. My president is really racist. This isn’t the president we deserve. DONT RECOMMEND THIS APP.

attributes.title: I Really Cannot Explain How Bad This App Is
attributes.review: I downloaded the app but then I realized I’m not a bigoted racist homophobic xenophobic Cheeto supporter. Would not recommend. Would have put zero stars if I could

attributes.title: Zero out of Five
attributes.review:
This app is disgusting!!! It’s gives false information and is a big propaganda scare. 
It is filled with racist and sexist messages and is a violation to human rights!!!! Take this app down, it is harmful🤬

attributes.title: this app just isn’t it
attributes.review: there was a mouse that popped out of my screen when i opened it. it escaped my room and ran around my house. it got out through an open window and went to my neighbors house and bit him. he got walking corpse syndrome and started a worldwide apocalypse. i’m very unsatisfied with my experience:(

attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: When I clicked on the app. It would load and then glitch out.

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: This app is the worst it took 2 weeks to download and when it finally downloaded it made my phone freez for 2 hr it was the worst😡

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This is the worst app out there, if I could could delete two apps from the App Store, I’d delete this one twice
